markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Dragon Wings](/Spells.aspx?ID=501)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 403 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodlines**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5), [Wyrmblessed](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=17)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111). You can increase the Focus Point cost by 1 to gain the effects of [_dragon claws_](/Spells.aspx?ID=500) as long as the wings last.

---
**Heightened (8th)** The duration increases to 10 minutes.
name: Dragon Wings

<summary>

</summary>
summary: Draconic wings sprout from your back.
summary_markdown: Draconic wings sprout from your back.
text: Dragon Wings Source Core Rulebook pg. 403 4.0 Bloodlines Draconic, Wyrmblessed Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as feather fall . You can increase the Focus Point cost by 1 to gain the effects of dragon claws as long as the wings last. --- Heightened (8th) The duration increases to 10 minutes.
